references: Related: CF 257528, CF 256655, Ord 94448. Amending: Ord 95211.
summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Ordinance 95211 to increase the appropriation therein made for payments to DeLeuw, Cather & Company under the contract authorized by Ordinance 94448 by a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, and declaring the emergency therefor.
